author: juergen
msg: post behaves like a put, if the resource is a document or does not exist. If the resource is a collection a 409 is returned.
Reason: more compatibility with some clients, sending a post instead of a put.

author: remm
msg: - If the namespace URL is null, the namespace name should be empty.
Bug reported by Robert Owen (eurrow at sas.com)

author: remm
msg: - The closing element must also use getLocalName.
Bug reported by Robert Owen (eurrow at sas.com)

author: remm
msg: - Slight changes in the namespace handling.
- The DOMWriter will now use a xmlns attribute to declare the node namespace.
That should provide a workaround for the problems reported during the
- Untested change to allow properties without a namespace (empty namespace name),
instead of putting them in the "DAV:" namespace.
